concept.title: Add Tags to a test case

conbody.p: You can add tags to a test case when you first create a test case. To learn more about how to create a test case, see Create Test Case.
You can also add tags to a test case using the Properties tab. Do as follows:

li.p: Switch to the Properties tab. In this tab, you can find more details on a test case, including associated tags.
Input your tag values, separate them by commas or semi-colons.
To remove a tag, delete it from the tag field.
